Class HttpWebApplicationServer

java.lang.Object
cloud.piranha.http.webapp.HttpWebApplicationServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServerProcessor, WebApplicationServer
public class HttpWebApplicationServer extends Object implements HttpServerProcessor, WebApplicationServer
